title: Read the label and live!
brief_description: Stresses the importance of reading the warnings found on labels of commonly used products. Illustrates safe handling practices for medicines, paint thinners, hair spray, insecticides and other commonly used preparations. Suitable for upper primary, lower and middle secondary levels.
